colour.models.dataset.pointer_gamut Module¶

Pointer’s Gamut¶

Defines Pointer’s Gamut data.

See also

RGB Colourspaces Jupyter Notebook

References

[1]Pointer, M. R. (1980). Pointer’s Gamut Data. Retrieved from http://www.cis.rit.edu/research/mcsl2/online/PointerData.xls
colour.models.dataset.pointer_gamut.POINTER_GAMUT_ILLUMINANT = array([ 0.31005673, 0.3161457 ])¶

Pointer’s Gamut illuminant SC.

POINTER_GAMUT_ILLUMINANT : ndarray

colour.models.dataset.pointer_gamut.POINTER_GAMUT_DATA = array([[ 15, 10, 0], [ 15, 15, 10], [ 15, 14, 20], ..., [ 90, 9, 330], [ 90, 4, 340], [ 90, 6, 350]])¶

Pointer’s Gamut data as a tuple of CIE LCHab colourspace matrices.

POINTER_GAMUT_DATA : ndarray
